attributes.action: ensure funding is provided to ensure ex service personnel receive suitable medical care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ex service personnel risk all for this country and deserve the best medical care available if their service results in medical problems. Many suffer serious mental illness as a result of their service-military specific units are best suited to help these people and they should not have to rely on the NHS which is poorly equipped to deal with their specialist needs.
